name: Good Lookin Home Cookin
description:
Play as Jessica and Amira, childhood best friends, running their dream food court during the busy month of Ramadan. 

Will their friendship withstand the pressure?

Or will the stress of running a business together shut down the GLHC food court for good?

You decide.

Playtime: An 'easily digestible' 60 minutes.

CMC vignettes are unique snack sized games. They feature characters and locations from Call Me Cera.

A portion of all Toadhouse Games sales goes to charities that benefit the marginalized groups our characters represent.  

Call Me Cera: A wholesome game about making friends as an adult. 
 Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1523870/Call_Me_Cera/ 

Come chat to us in our Toadhouse Discord: https://discord.gg/Q5mK58hMSt 

Play the CMC vignettes here: https://teamtoadhouse.itch.io/ 

Follow Toadhouse Games: https://twitter.com/Toadhouse_Games
Follow Call Me Cera: https://twitter.com/CallMeCera
Follow Team Toadhouse: https://twitter.com/Toadhouse_Games

If your computer tries to block the application: 

Windows users: Click the “Open Settings” link or head back to Settings > Apps > Apps & Features and set the option to "Allow apps from anywhere."

If Microsoft Defender SmartScreen pops up: Click more info, click run anyway.

Mac Users: Right click on application, click 'open.' Agree to the pop up.
